title: Frequently Asked Questions
subtitle: Everything you need to know about my free application assistance

dataHandling.question: What happens to my data and CV when I upload them?
dataHandling.answer: Your documents are used exclusively for application assistance. They are stored securely and not shared with third parties. You can request deletion of your data at any time.

storage.question: Where are my files stored?
storage.answer: Your documents are stored in secure storage (Supabase Storage in the EU region). Access is protected and logged.

retention.question: How long is my data retained?
retention.answer: We only keep documents as long as necessary for support. We will delete your data at any time upon request.

access.question: Who has access to my documents?
access.answer: Only I have access to your documents to help you optimize your applications.

deletion.question: Can I request deletion of my CV?
deletion.answer: Yes, at any time. Just write to me at marcel.welk@bewerbungsmensch.de and we will delete your data immediately.

cta.title: Your question wasn't included?
cta.description: Just send me a message â€“ I'm happy to help!
